articles.author: Jeffrey L. Wilson
articles.title: The Best Microsoft Xbox One Games for 2021 – PCMag AU - PCMag AU
articles.description: The Xbox Series S and X may dominate video game headlines, but don't overlook the Xbox One. The console's stellar library, a potent mix of excellent first- and third-party games, make it a worthwhile purchase.
articles.content: It's difficult to imagine a Microsoft-backed product as an underdog, but the Xbox One is just that. The PlayStation 4 soars on the strength of its strong console-exclusive titles; and the Nintendo Sw… [+2764 chars]
